name: Rewinery
overview:
Rewinery partners with award-winning wineries to provide customers with spectacular wines at a tremendous value. 2 boutique wines for a $30 flat fee in San Francisco.

Rewinery seeks out good wines which you are not able to find at neighborhood stores, and negotiate enormous discounts. These discounts are passed on to the customer, but because it’s important for a winery to protect its brand, they remove their label and add their own.

At Rewinery, you can buy wine whenever you feel like it.We can deliver to your home or office or wherever you may be, and quickly—usually within the hour. If you ever receive a wine that you don’t like, we’ll send you a different one. Just like that.
